title: Add Webpack Configuration to a project
description: Add Webpack Configuration to a project.

project.x-prompt: What is the name of the project to set up a webpack for?

compiler.description: The compiler to use to build source.

main.description: Path relative to the workspace root for the main entry file. Defaults to '<projectRoot>/src/main.ts'.

tsConfig.description: Path relative to the workspace root for the tsconfig file to build with. Defaults to '<projectRoot>/tsconfig.app.json'.

target.description: Target platform for the build, same as the Webpack config option.

skipValidation.description: Do not perform any validation on existing project.

devServer.description: Add a serve target to run a local webpack dev-server

webpackConfig.description: Path relative to workspace root to a custom webpack file that takes a config object and returns an updated config.
